mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_service_order_official_remarks ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, official_id, service_order_id, content) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{officialId}, #{serviceOrderId}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, official_id AS officialId, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, content FROM b_service_order_official_remarks WHERE service_order_id = #{serviceOrderId} AND official_id = #{officialId} ORDER BY gmt_create ASC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_service_order_official_remarks WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
